name: Spore Story
description:
Spore Story is a passive platforming adventure for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.

Reach new heights as you journey onward, from one life to the next, as a mushroom spore floating in the wind. 

Use rich soil, streams, and wind to launch high and spread far, avoiding rocks, sand, lava, and other obstacles along the way. 

A collaborative effort with The Doc, MachineFossil, L4zyL30, and jessplusplus.

Keyboard Controls:

  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Primary : Space (hold to power-up/quick-fall & double tap to dash)
  • Rotate Camera: Tab /  X C / [ ]
  • Reset: R

Gamepad:

  • Move: Left Stick / D-Pad
  • Primary: A (hold to power-up/quick-fall & double tap to dash)
  • Rotate Camera: LR Trigger / LR Bumper
  • Reset: Select

Thanks for playing!
